title: Outdoor Spa, Online Payments Available, Short-Term Lease Available
posting_body: ['YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', "Conveniently located in Westminster, Colorado, halfway between Denver's central business district and Boulder County and ensconced against breathtaking and idyllic mountain scenery, Westcliff Apartments will not disappoint!", "Featuring one, two and three bedroom apartment homes with stainless steel appliances, upgraded kitchens and the largest square footage in the area, Westcliff is Westminster's premiere apartment community.", 'Call or visit us today!', 'Amenities Include:', 'Linen Closets', '48-hour Maintenance Commitment', 'Short-Term Lease Available', 'Fireplaces in 2nd and 3rd story homes', 'Full-size Washer and Dryer Included', 'Online Payments Available', 'Strength and Cardio Center', 'Resort-Style Pool', 'Outdoor Spa', 'Gazebo with a Fire Pit & Gas Grill', 'Game Room', 'Newly Redesigned Kitchens', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
